org.apache.storm.topology

Class SharedOffHeapWithinWorker

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.storm.generated.SharedMemory
      • org.apache.storm.topology.SharedOffHeapWithinWorker
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable, Cloneable, Comparable<SharedMemory>, org.apache.storm.thrift.TBase<SharedMemory,SharedMemory._Fields>, org.apache.storm.thrift.TSerializable

    public class SharedOffHeapWithinWorker
extends SharedMemory

    A request for a shared memory region off heap, but only within a worker.

    See Also:

        Create a new request for a shared memory region off heap within a worker
